## ğŸš€ Features

- ğŸŒ **Run in any `JavaScript` environment**: Supports `Node.js`, browsers and any `JavaScript` framework
- ğŸ“¡ **Can be referenced through `CDN`**: Supports both `jsdelivr` and `unpkg`
- âš¡ï¸ **Completely tree-shaking**: Comes with `Tree-shaking`, only packages the imported code
- ğŸ’« **Zero Dependencies**: Zero `Dependencies` dependencies, only the project itself will be installed
- ğŸ¦¾ **Strong Type**: Written in `TypeScript`, with powerful type derivation hints
- ğŸ’¯ **`100%` test**: `100%` test coverage, `100%` test pass rate

## ğŸ“¦ Install

```bash
# npm
npm install @pureadmin/utils

# or yarn
yarn add @pureadmin/utils

# or pnpm
pnpm add @pureadmin/utils
```

## ğŸ“¡ `CDN`

```html
<!-- provide a global variable `PureUtils`, which contains all methods
 -->

<!-- jsdelivr -->
<script src="//cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/@pureadmin/utils"></script>

<!-- unpkg -->
<script src="//unpkg.com/@pureadmin/utils"></script>
```
